    if err != nil {
        awsErr, ok := err.(awserr.Error)
        if ok && awsErr.Code() == "NoSuchWebsiteConfiguration" {
            fmt.Println("Bucket does not have a website configuration")
        } else {
            fmt.Println("Got error retrieving bucket website configuration:")
            fmt.Println(err)
        }

        return
    }
